hints.content:
We can think of $\purpleC{413}$ as $\purpleC{4\text{ hundreds}}$, $\purpleC{1\text{ ten}}$, and $\purpleC{3 \text{ ones}}$.  

We can think of $\blueD{482}$ as $\blueD{4\text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{8\text{ tens}}$, and $\blueD{2\text{ ones}}$.

$\phantom{=}\purpleC{413}+\blueD{482}$

$=\purpleC{4\text{ hundreds}}+\purpleC{1\text{ ten}}+\purpleC{3\text{ ones}}+\blueD{4\text{ hundreds}}+\blueD{8\text{ tens}}+\blueD{2\text{ ones}}$

$= \purpleC{4\text{ hundreds}}+\blueD{4\text{ hundreds}}+\purpleC{1\text{ ten}}+\blueD{8\text{ tens}}+\purpleC{3\text{ ones}}+\blueD{2\text{ ones}}$
The answer: $4\text{ hundreds} + 4\text{ hundreds} + 1 \text{ ten}+8\text{ tens} +3 \text{ ones}+2 \text{ ones}$

choices.content: $\small 4\text{ hundreds} + 4\text{ hundreds} + 1 \text{ ten}+2\text{ tens} +8 \text{ ones}+3 \text{ ones}$
$\small 4\text{ hundreds} + 4\text{ tens} + 1 \text{ ten}+8\text{ tens} +3 \text{ ones}+2 \text{ ones}$
$\small 4\text{ hundreds} + 4\text{ hundreds} + 1 \text{ ten}+8\text{ tens} +3 \text{ ones}+2 \text{ ones}$
